Content: 7 differently-able Officers and 96 Other Rankers including the staff at Pangolla ‘Abimansala - 3’ in order to elevate spiritual standards of the inmates participated in a one-day meditation session on Tuesday (18). Organized by the Directorate of Psychological Operations, Ven Diyasenpura Vimala Thero of the Baunseth Meditation Centre at Dekatana conducted the meditation sessions.
